   <title>Sig Zane Designs makes 26 deliveries via Uber</title>
   <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 01:01:45 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Lorin Eleni Gill</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/yLSUJeqpJhA/sig-zane-designs-makes-26-deliveries-via-uber.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/pacific/news/2016/05/12/sig-zane-designs-makes-26-deliveries-via-uber.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9616432/fullsizerender*100xx640-640-0-0.jpg">In what appears to be the first clothing company partnership with Uber in Hawaii, Sig Zane Designs made 26 deliveries of aloha shirts to customers in Downtown Honolulu on Thursday.

“It’s been going absolutely crazy,” said Kuhao Zane, the company’s designer and owner of the new Sig on Smith shop. “We sold out of two sizes.”

The promotion with the car-sharing company ran through 3 p.m.

“I wish it was my idea,” said Zane, also a PBN 2015 Forty under 40 awardee. “It was really the…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=yLSUJeqpJhA:FUMiKZPxuiA:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>

  <item>
   <title>Strategies: Things are buzzing inside Bee Thinking's hives</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 23:28:57 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>James Cronin</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/Me4Ru1jvDaY/strategies-things-are-buzzing-inside-bee-thinkings.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/portland/blog/sbo/2016/05/strategies-things-are-buzzing-inside-bee-thinkings.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9598042/matt-reed-even-more-bes*100xx1840-1840-712-0.jpg">A Portland company that started from nurturing a single bee back to health in 2008 has become a multi-million dollar beehive manufacturer — and is about to open the Northwest’s first mead-only bottle shop and tasting room.

Bee Thinking manufactures hives for backyard beekeepers and sells them through a retail space in Southeast Portland and online, the source of most of its sales.

In just two years, the company quadrupled to more than $4 million in 2015. Now, it’s growing its physical footprint.

More…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Me4Ru1jvDaY:AFwjTte0km0:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/portland/blog/sbo/2016/05/strategies-things-are-buzzing-inside-bee-thinkings.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>Marrone Bio posts smaller loss, growing sales</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:16:25 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Mark Anderson</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/Bu4TRSoBQgQ/marrone-bio-posts-smaller-loss-growing-sales.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/sacramento/news/2016/05/12/marrone-bio-posts-smaller-loss-growing-sales.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/1466791/marronebioinnovationslogo*100xx224-224-1-0.jpg">Marrone Bio Innovations Inc., the Davis-based developer of biologically based products to control agricultural pests, reported stronger sales and a smaller first-quarter loss as it looks to move on from a financial scandal.

Revenue rose 30 percent to $2.7 million in the first quarter of this year from $2.1 million a year earlier, the company said Thursday.

Marrone's $9.3 million loss compared to a loss of $11.9 million the first quarter the previous year. The company said its had fewer expenses…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=Bu4TRSoBQgQ:gbd63Kxj9P4:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>

  <item>
   <title>Boeing goal: Snag bigger chunk of $2.8 trillion aircraft upgrade, repair business</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:13:44 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Steve Wilhelm</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/NvUxkKu3bcs/boeing-goal-snag-bigger-chunk-of-2-8-trillion.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/seattle/blog/techflash/2016/05/boeing-goal-snag-bigger-chunk-of-2-8-trillion.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9614452/boeing-parts*100xx712-712-43-0.png">Boeing doesn't want to just build jets. It wants to maintain and service them.

Boeing (NYSE: BA) is pushing hard to expand its place in the fast-growing market for fixing and upgrading existing jets. That's because over the next 20 years that market will be as large the value of all narrow-body jets sold worldwide.

Boeing Commercial Airplanes CEO Ray Conner took time to emphasize the aftermarket business on Wednesday, during Boeing’s 2016 annual investors’ conference in Bellevue.

The concept…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=NvUxkKu3bcs:T4mteOkL7bw:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/seattle/blog/techflash/2016/05/boeing-goal-snag-bigger-chunk-of-2-8-trillion.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>Apple shares hit two-year low as hopes dim for resurgent iPhone sales</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 22:03:45 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Jennifer Elias</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/WGNTj3pNHYU/apple-shares-hit-two-year-low-as-hopes-dim-for.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/sanjose/news/2016/05/12/apple-shares-hit-two-year-low-as-hopes-dim-for.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/474701/apple*100xx2198-2198-401-0.jpg">Apple shares slid to a nearly two-year low Thursday after a news report cast fresh doubt on whether the company can stem slumping iPhone sales.

According to a report from the Nikkei Asia Review, Taiwanese suppliers are expecting a significant cutback in iPhone orders in the last part of the year as sales of the iPhone 6s continue to decline and concerns mount that the iPhone 7, expected in the fall, will contain only incremental improvements.

Nikkei reported the supplier for chips used in the iPhone,…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=WGNTj3pNHYU:JvyfO-QJ2ag:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/sanjose/news/2016/05/12/apple-shares-hit-two-year-low-as-hopes-dim-for.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>How Francine Hardaway's new venture is helping kids in STEM</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:41:26 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Hayley Ringle</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/xSaZV1pa1fA/how-francine-hardaways-new-venture-is-helping-kids.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/blog/techflash/2016/05/how-francine-hardaways-new-venture-is-helping-kids.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9614412/unknown*100xx695-694-8-0.png">Local tech guru Francine Hardaway started a new print-on-demand business to raise money for a local STEM school and do research on what it takes to run such a company.

Inspirations from Francine offers printed t-shirts, mugs, cell phone cases, tank tops and hoodies for any business, nonprofit or corporation.

Along with her own designs, Hardaway said she’ll give “highly-discounted prices” to groups “just to raise a few dollars” for the SySTEM middle school at 13th Street and McDowell Road.

The…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=xSaZV1pa1fA:FHj1E1cB9j8:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/blog/techflash/2016/05/how-francine-hardaways-new-venture-is-helping-kids.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>Optiv makes second acquisition in 30 days</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:38:12 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Leslie Collins</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/cK_hSn9aoE0/optiv-makes-second-acquisition-in-30-days.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/kansascity/news/2016/05/12/optiv-makes-second-acquisition-in-30-days.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description>Optiv Security has finalized its second acquisition in 30 days.

Optiv Security, the new combined company of Overland Park-based FishNet Security Inc. and Denver-based Accuvant Inc., has acquired substantially all the assets of California-based Evantix GRC. Financial details were not disclosed.

Founded in 2006, Evantix is a vendor risk-management company that offers an SaaS (software as a service) platform to help enterprises with regulatory compliance and assessing risk with third-party vendors…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=cK_hSn9aoE0:QFjmKkhHPZY:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/kansascity/news/2016/05/12/optiv-makes-second-acquisition-in-30-days.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>See who are the finalists for Arizona's top technology executives</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:36:31 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Patrick O'Grady</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/gB6ykbICUXY/see-who-are-the-finalists-for-arizonas-top.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/blog/techflash/2016/05/see-who-are-the-finalists-for-arizonas-top.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9612462/youngjeremy*100xx4054-4054-0-102.jpg">Arizona has a strong and growing tech community, and Thursday night some its prominent leaders will be recognized.

The Phoenix Business Journal will honor 18 members of the tech community for their work during the past year at the annual AZ Top Tech Exec Awards, held at the Phoenix Art Museum.



To see who are the finalists, click on the slideshow



The awards are a continuation of the Business Journal's efforts to recognize those making the technology industry an important and growing part o…<div class="feedflare">
<a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:yIl2AUoC8zA"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=yIl2AUoC8zA" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:V_sGLiPBpWU"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:V_sGLiPBpWU" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:F7zBnMyn0Lo"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:F7zBnMyn0Lo" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:gIN9vFwOqvQ"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?i=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:gIN9vFwOqvQ" border="0"></img></a> <a href="http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~ff/industry_7?a=gB6ykbICUXY:S83gLU2QehI:qj6IDK7rITs"><img src="http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/industry_7?d=qj6IDK7rITs" border="0"></img></a>
</div></description>
  <feedburner:origLink>http://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/blog/techflash/2016/05/see-who-are-the-finalists-for-arizonas-top.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</feedburner:origLink></item>
  <item>
   <title>There will soon be six nonstop flights from Seattle to China with new Xiamen route</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:27:34 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Steve Wilhelm</dc:creator>

   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/seattle/news/2016/05/12/there-will-soon-be-six-nonstop-flights-from.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9613202/xiamenannounce*100xx490-490-155-0.jpg">Airlines will fly a record six nonstop routes between major Chinese cities and Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, when Xiamen Airlines starts nonstop service in September.

The new three-times-weekly service will then connect to Xiamen, a city 360 miles to the northeast of Shenzhen.

The Port of Seattle and the airline announced the service Wednesday at a press conference in the Chinese city of Shenzhen. Seattle Mayor Ed Murray and other Seattle-area business leaders are in China this week to…<div class="feedflare">

</div></description>

   <title>Healthcare a top target for data breaches</title>
   <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 21:25:51 +0000</pubDate>
   <dc:creator>Malia Spencer</dc:creator>
   <link>http://feeds.bizjournals.com/~r/industry_7/~3/ZAUP5DIEmvs/healthcare-a-top-target-for-data-breaches.html</link>
   <guid isPermaLink="false">http://www.bizjournals.com/sanjose/news/2016/05/12/healthcare-a-top-target-for-data-breaches.html?ana=RSS%26s=article_search</guid>
   <description><img src="http://media.bizj.us/view/img/9608432/thinkstockphotos-479801118*100xx2579-2579-645-0.jpg">No company or industry is safe from the rise of data breaches and other cybersecurity problems.

In the sixth annual Benchmark Study on Privacy & Security of Healthcare Data by the Ponemon Institute paints a bleak picture for healthcare organizations.

The institute, which studies information and privacy management, spoke to senior level health care executives and health care vendors to compile this year’s report. The study was paid for by Tigard-based ID Experts, which helps clients identify and…<div class="feedflare">
